author: mid-day online correspondent
title: After being called 'porn star', TV actress Nia Sharma shuts down trolls who slut-shamed -
text:
After being called 'porn star', TV actress Nia Sharma shuts down trolls who slut-shamed her. Pic/Nia Sharma's Instagram account 
After being called 'cheap' and a 'porn star' by trolls for flaunting her sexy dance moves in a video, TV actress Nia Sharma has hit back at her haters who slut-shamed her with yet another video.
On Sunday, Nia Sharma posted a black-and-white video showing off her sensuous moves, but received lot of hate on social media.
Watch video:

A video posted by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) onJan 29, 2017 at 10:18am PST
 
On Tuesday, Nia Sharma gave it back to her trolls by posting yet another similar video and shared a powerful message that read, "Oops! Here's one more from the photoshoot!! Ready to slut-shame a girl again? Go ahea .. I'll post five more...Coz thats exactly I got this shoot done.!! And thats exactly how I'll post pictures from the same! I appreciate everyone who took out time from their absolutely worthless lives to write filthy long comments on my previous video.! I got u job again! (sic)"
